title: Hyundai Steel 3Q Net Loss Widens Sharply on Year
text:
By Kwanwoo Jun

Hyundai Steel Co.'s (004020.SE) third-quarter net loss widened sharply due to growing debt, stagnant steel-product prices and high raw-material costs.

Its net loss was 65.76 billion Korean won ($56.3 million) compared with its KRW38.11 billion loss in the same quarter a year earlier, the South Korean steelmaker said on Tuesday. The result was much worse than a FactSet consensus forecast for a net profit of KRW50.84 billion.

Third-quarter revenue fell 3.6% on year to KRW5.047 trillion while its operating profit fell 67% on year to KRW34.11 billion.
